abstract: Pennsylvania Gov Tom Corbett declares fiscal emergency in capital Harrisburg, which allows him to assume financial control of the city and name the state’s first municipal receiver; empowered by legislation he signed, Corbett says city’s fiscal distress warrants such action.
snippet: Gov. Tom Corbett on Monday declared a fiscal emergency in Harrisburg, which allows him to assume financial control of the city and name the state’s first municipal receiver.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Tom Corbett on Monday declared a fiscal emergency in Harrisburg, which allows him to assume financial control of the city and name the state’s first municipal receiver.

headline.seo: Pennsylvania Governor Declares Emergency in Harrisburg
